LayoutNode.Content:
Head Lines Solapur:B S Kulkarni gets Shrusti Mitra Puraskar Noted Orinthologist B.S.Kulkarni received Shrusti Mitra Purarskar from the Chief Minister of Maharastra on 4 th June 2011for his contribution to conservation of nature and specifically for an article for the kids . Mr B.S. Kulkarni has to his credit of finding the great Indian Bustard at Nanaj in 1972 and is crusader to protect Solapur lakes. He has written more than 10 best selling books on Nature.
Solapur: Adhar card Gets good response The central Goverment scheme of providiing Citizen ship card " AadHar" has received good response. Three lakh people have taken advantage from Solapur District and have registered for the card.There are 70 centres in the city where people can take the benefit of the same.For registration the basic requirement of proof of living and photo Id.Passort drivinglicence are valid documents.

LayoutNode.SRC:
Head Lines

Solapur:B S Kulkarni gets Shrusti Mitra Puraskar

Noted Orinthologist B.S.Kulkarni received Shrusti Mitra Purarskar from the Chief

Minister of Maharastra on 4 th June 2011for his contribution to conservation of

nature and specifically for an article for the kids . Mr B.S. Kulkarni
has to his credit of finding the great Indian Bustard at Nanaj in 1972 and is crusader to protect Solapur lakes. He has written more than 10 best selling books on Nature.

Solapur: Adhar card Gets good response
The central Goverment scheme of providiing Citizen ship card " AadHar" has received good response. Three lakh people have taken advantage from Solapur District and have registered for the card.There are 70 centres in the city where people can take the benefit of the same.For registration the basic requirement of proof of living and photo Id.Passort drivinglicence are valid documents.
